group_1.textLeft: I see...
There’s been serial murders and@a rumor of a "Ripper Girl" in Hozuki City,
and you came over here to investigate@whether any Witches are involved.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, since the Coat Ripper Girl rumor@started in Kamihama.
We’re investigating whether it’s connected to@the Memory Ripper Girl now, too.
Could you tell us what you’ve heard?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
...My friend went missing.
She said that@"someone really did lose their memory,"
so she was investigating the Ripper Girl rumor...
The Memory Ripper Girl, to borrow your term.

group_1.textRight: (Investigating because "someone really did@lose their memory"...?)
That’d certainly be worrying...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Akira...
My friend’s name is Akira Shinobu.
She’s a Magical Girl, too.

group_1.textRight: Really?!

group_1.textLeft: I haven’t heard the specifics,
but she said that she was looking into the@Ripper Girl rumor with the rest of her team.
So I think something must’ve happened while@she was with Nanaka and the others...
I don’t know where her other teammates are,@either.

group_1.textRight: I see. So you’re looking into the Ripper Girl...
...in the hopes of finding clues to@Akira’s whereabouts.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I’ve got a couple other friends helping out,@too...

group_1.textRight: Ah...
Then did we interrupt you at a bad time,@back there?

group_1.textLeft: No, not at all!

group_1.textRight: Really?

group_1.textLeft: I heard a bell ringing, and@when I followed the sound...
I ran into that girl with a coat like in the rumor,@so I tried talking to her.
But I still don’t know how you’re supposed to@defend yourself,
so I might’ve been in big trouble if you guys@hadn’t arrived...
She asked me my name and everything, too...

group_1.textRight: Does that mean you got attacked?

group_1.textLeft: Thankfully, nope!

group_1.textRight: Phew.
You said a moment ago that Akira and@her teammates...
...were investigating the Memory Ripper Girl.
Had they been looking into the Coat Ripper Girl@at all?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Nope, haven’t heard anything@in particular about that.

group_1.textRight: (They were only looking into the rumor that@spread afterwards...?)
(Why would that be?)
(If it were me, I’d investigate both.@The connection’s still unclear, after all...)
(Maybe they didn’t need to investigate the@Coat Ripper Girl?)
(Because... They already knew enough@information about it?)
(Or because they knew it was unconnected?)

group_1.textLeft: Senpai?
Is something wrong?

group_1.textRight: No, nothing.
(We don’t have enough information to@determine that right now.)
More importantly, Natsuki.
If it’s alright with you, would you like to@investigate the Ripper Girl together?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!@[chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]Can I?

group_1.textRight: We’re totally new to Kamihama, so@we’d love it if you could help us out.

group_1.textLeft: Same to you!@I’d love it if we could work together!

group_1.textRight: Thank you.@Pleasure to be working with you, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Nice to meet you guys, too!
So first off, do you want me to call my friends?
There’s two more people who I’m@investigating with!
